ClassDef.summary: The smallest dockable unit within the docking framework.

remarks.para: derives from class. To use the DockPanel library, derive your form from class, and implement your user interface in this class. There are several overloaded methods to show as specified docking state. If property is set to true and is , the menu of the form will be merged into to the main form automatically.

Property.name: AllowRedocking
Property.summary: Gets or sets to specify whether drag and drop re-docking is allowed.
Property.value: True if drag and drop re-docking is allowed, otherwise, false.

Property.name: AutoHidePortion
Property.summary: Gets or sets to specify the portion of the screen size when showing in auto-hide mode.
Property.value: A value between 0 and 1 to specify the portion of the DockPanel to determine the size of the window when displaying in auto-hide mode. The default value is 0.25 (25%).
Property.exception: Thrown when value is not between 0 and 1.

Property.name: CloseButton
Property.summary: Gets or sets to enalbe/disable the close button for this DockContent in the DockPane.
Property.value: True to enable the close button; false to disable.

Property.name: DockableAreas
Property.summary: Gets or sets to specify the areas this DockContent can be displayed.
Property.value: Combination of values. If conflicts with this value, a exception will be thrown.

Property.name: DockPanel
Property.summary: Gets or sets to attach/detach the DockContent to DockPanel.
Property.value: object to attach. Null to detach this DockContent to any DockPanel.

Property.name: DockState
Property.summary: Gets or sets the docking state of .
Property.value:
One of the values:
Value Description
Valid only when the is newly initialized or detached from . Can not be explicitly set.
Synchronized with the property.
Others
Synchronized with the docking state of .

Property.name: FloatPane
Property.summary: Gets or sets the containing object when floating.

Property.name: HideOnClose
Property.summary: Gets or sets to determine when clicking the close button, the DockContent form should be closed or hidden.
Property.value: True to hide the form when clicking the close button; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

Property.name: IsActivated
Property.summary: Gets to specified the DockContent object is currently activated.
Property.value: True if the DockContent object is currently activated, otherwise, false.

Property.name: IsFloat
Property.summary: Gets or sets whether the DockContent object is floating.
Property.value: True if the DockContent object is floating; otherwise, false.

Property.name: IsHidden
Property.summary: Gets or sets whether the DockContent object is hidden.
Property.value: True if the DockContent object is hidden; otherwise, false.

Property.name: Pane
Property.summary: Gets or sets the displayed containing object.
Property.remarks: A object can have two containing objects: and . The property returns currently displaying containing . The docking state of a object is always synchronized with its displaying containing .

Property.name: PanelPane
Property.summary: Gets or sets the containing object when docked.

Property.name: ShowHint
Property.summary: Gets or sets the desired docking state for this DockContent object.
Property.value: One of the valid values. This value should not conflicts with property.

Property.name: TabPageContextMenu
Property.summary: Gets or sets the context menu for the DockPane tab page.
Property.value: The for the DockPane tab page.

Property.name: TabText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text to display for the DockPane tab strip.
Property.value: The text to display for the DockPane tab strip.
Property.remarks: If this value is not set, the value of will be used.

Property.name: ToolTipText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip text for this form.
Property.value: The tooltip text for this form.

Property.name: VisibleState
Property.summary: Gets or sets the visible docking state for this form.
Property.value: One of the values for visible docking state of this form.

Method.name: Activate()
Method.summary: Activates the DockContent form and gives it focus.
Method.remarks: Activating the DockContent form makes it the of its containing . To determine the active DockContent in an application, use property. To determine the active document content, use property.

Method.name: GetPersistString()
Method.summary: Gets the string to persist this DockContent object.
Method.returns: The string to persist this DockContent object.

Method.name: IsDockStateValid(DockState)
Method.summary: Test with to see whether the specified is valid.

Method.name: OnDockStateChanged(EventArgs)
Method.param: An that contains the event data.

Method.name: Show()
Method.summary: Displays the form, with default settings.

Method.name: Show(DockPane, DockAlignment, double)
Method.summary: Displays the form, as specified nested docking.
Method.param: The edge of the target to dock.
The proportion size of the source to take inside the target .

Method.name: Show(DockPane, DockContent)
Method.summary: Displays the form, at the specified tab location of DockPane
Method.param: The target to contain this DockContent.
The position to show in the tab strip of the . Null to show at the last position in the tab strip.

Method.name: Show(DockPanel)
Method.summary: Displays the form, attaching to specified DockPanel.

Method.name: Show(DockPanel, Rectangle)
Method.summary: Displays the form, as floating window at the specified location and size.
Method.param: The bounds of the floating window.

Method.name: Show(DockPanel, DockState)
Method.summary: Displays the form, with specified docking state.
